comment: " We come from the tradition of Parnell and Hume . Our vision is big and it is broad . Our mission is to unite all of our people , not divide them any further . " is the first new MP to deliver his maiden speech in the House of Commons . <URL>
amr:
# ::snt " We come from the tradition of Parnell and Hume . Our vision is big and it is broad . Our mission is to unite all of our people , not divide them any further . " is the first new MP to deliver his maiden speech in the House of Commons . <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / come-03
            :ARG1 (w / we)
            :ARG2 (t / tradition
                  :poss (a / and
                        :op1 (p / person
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Parnell"))
                        :op2 (p2 / person
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Hume")))))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (b / big
                  :domain (e / envision-01
                        :ARG0 (w2 / we)))
            :op2 (b2 / broad-02
                  :ARG1 e))
      :snt3 (m2 / mission-01
            :ARG0 (w3 / we)
            :ARG1 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (u / unite-01
                        :ARG0 w3
                        :ARG1 (p3 / person
                              :mod (a4 / all)
                              :poss w3))
                  :op2 (d / divide-02
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG0 w3
                        :ARG1 p3
                        :degree (f / further
                              :mod (a5 / any)))))
      :snt4 (d2 / deliver-01
            :ARG0 (p4 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Parliament"))
                        :ARG2 (m3 / member))
                  :ARG1-of (n4 / new-01)
                  :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                        :value 1))
            :ARG1 (s / speak-01
                  :ARG0 p4
                  :mod (m4 / maiden)
                  :location g)))
